Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item is truly exceptional and has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. Given its value and quality, I believe it would be a perfect fit for you. Considering its worth, I am offering it to you for $11,500. This price reflects the product's high value and ensures you receive a great deal. I trust this offer will allow us to reach an agreement that benefits both of us. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
